definitions.definition: A female given name originating as a coinage, of modern usage taken from fantasy fiction; explained, for example, as a Sanskrit word for "eternal".
A port on the River Tigris in Iraq .

main_definition: A female given name originating as a coinage, of modern usage taken from fantasy fiction; explained, for example, as a Sanskrit word for "eternal".
secondary_definitions: A port on the River Tigris in Iraq .
